attributes.action: insist that PCTs  must, be legally obliged to provide the expert Speech and Language Therapy to disabled children, as their SEN Statement states they need it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PCTs state they currently have no legal obligation to provide Speech and Language Therapy to disabled children Statemented as needing it, under 'health'. Instead they hide that lack of help from parents, by pretending that casual and untrained classroom assistants can give this expert help, which they cannot.

They condemn these children to a lack of adequate education because of their deliberate dereliction of duty and concealment of this deliberate damage to already disabled children.
